Posts.Content: Hello i fairly new to the site.Its been neally a year ago in deb since i had grade 3 breast cancer ive suffered like a lot of people after surgery could not work for 5months,and then i went into depression which appears to be a normal thing afterwards,but i seem to be coping now.My problem is now that in in a lot of pain in my breast it is so bad it feels like someone is cutting me ,i am unable to sleep on my side,hurts to cough,move ect.Has any one had any of my symtoms at this stage. X
Posts.Title: a year neally after surgery

Posts.Content: Hi Maggie.Thank you for your reply.yes i was sent down there from A&E a few days ago as i was in so much pain when i got to king Edwards in Windsor the consultant wasn't there so the nurse made the appointment.I do feel for you like I said earlier i read your profile,i zagree with you all the way about life is different now in the way of tiredness and can do the things we use to love.my 12 hrs shifts are so long and if i don't get the chance to rest in between in awful.I don't get alot of help at home by my family either i do think that i am a super women xxx,Karen b
Posts.Title: a year neally after surgery

Posts.Content: Hello Maggie.Thank your reply to me.I fo feel for you,and yes i was only saying a while back that i thought all this was over and yes people think we are fine now but little they know.my family take it for granted and wish they would understand.I work 12 hrs shifts with mental have for children and i do feel its to much now.I am seeing my consultant on Monday.Medication does not work for me and o am unable to wear a bra also.So o fo feel for you.it helps to talk to you and others Where are you at with every thing at the moment xx karenk
Posts.Title: a year neally after surgery

Posts.Content: Hello Karen,thank you for contacting me back.I am seeing my consultant on Monday and hope that he can resolve this,i thought it was over with pain.I am fed up with it all also,my life has changed how r u now ? Xx karen
Posts.Title: a year neally after surgery

Posts.Content: I had surgery in deb 2013 for breast cancer and now i have devolped a bad discomfort and pain in the breast in the same one i had cancer its been 7 days now since i discover this it hurts all the time all over hurts to touch and cough ,has any one had this or may be know what it is.i had the all clear in the June 2013 I am not the type of person to tun to the doctors but i sm in a lot of pain thanks k...
Posts.Title: please help

Posts.Content: Sorry that meant to say that u haven't told me about your self ,,x
Posts.Title: please help

Posts.Content: Oh my that is awful,pain is a dreadful thing,no one understands no one unless u have gone through it,I luckly escaped from chemo yes i can imagine u r grumpy ,u can not help it .It takes a lot out of you,my family has been good but the support has worn off they think im fine but mentally i am struggling,i am a postive person but how positive can you be when u have pain.xx
Posts.Title: please help

Posts.Content: Yes i have they were very good but feel that i don't want to keep phoning them even though they have been wonderful people The pain sometimes stabs a few times in one go and the sore with pain with discomfort is here all the time... Its good to chat.Ihave 3 very good sisters who has helped me but it good to talk to you as we know how we feel x
Posts.Title: please help

Posts.Content: Hi Louise.Thank u for your reply,yes i finshed my treatment of radiothearpy in April.idid not have pain like this since my surgery in deb and was wondering why am i suffering again now. I don't want to visit the Gp yet as it my go away i hope.so how are you..karenxx
Posts.Title: please help

Posts.Content: Hi Louise thank you.I will go and see him but not yet.i will let you know,you have told me about ur self how r u ?
